import React from 'react' import emptyImage from '../../images/empty-cart.png' import {CartItem} from '../../components' import {clearCart, removeCartItem, plusCartItem, minusCartItem} from '../../redux/actions/cart' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {DishesButton} from '../../components' function Cart() { const {totalPrice, totalCount, items } = useSelector( ({cart}) => cart) const addedDishes = Object.values(items).map( dish => Object.values(dish).map( elem => Object.values(elem).map(elem => elem ) ) ) const dispatch = useDispatch() const onClearCart = () => { if(window.confirm('–û—á–∏—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É')){ dispatch(clearCart()) } } const onRemoveCartItem = (id) => { if(window.confirm('–£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å?')){ dispatch(removeCartItem(id)) } } const onPlusCartItem = (id) => { dispatch(plusCartItem(id)) } const onMinusCartItem = (id) => { dispatch(minusCartItem(id)) } return (
{ totalCount ?
